mapper.sql: ID, JOB_ID, NAME, BEAN_NAME, METHOD_NAME, PARAMS, STATUS, ERROR, TIMES, CREATE_DATE
mapper.select:
select
from SCHEDULE_JOB_LOG order by id desc
mapper.insert:
insert into SCHEDULE_JOB_LOG (ID, JOB_ID, NAME, BEAN_NAME, METHOD_NAME, PARAMS, STATUS, ERROR, TIMES, CREATE_DATE) values (#{po.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{po.jobId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{po.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{po.beanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{po.methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{po.params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{po.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{po.error,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{po.times,jdbcType=INTEGER}, to_date(#{po.createDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))
SELECT SCHEDULE_JOB_LOG_SEQ.NEXTVAL-1 from DUAL
mapper.update: update SCHEDULE_JOB_LOG set JOB_ID = #{po.jobId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NAME = #{po.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BEAN_NAME = #{po.beanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, METHOD_NAME = #{po.methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAMS = #{po.params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{po.status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ERROR = #{po.error,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIMES = #{po.times,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_DATE = #{po.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{po.id}
